sqls.sql: select * from AT_A_SM_STOCKINGMAIN where 1=1 <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if location_s??> and LOCATION_S=:location_s </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if state_s??> and STATE_S=:state_s </#if> <#if stockno_s??> and STOCKNO_S=:stockno_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if vehiclecount_d??> and VEHICLECOUNT_D=:vehiclecount_d </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by atr_key desc </#if>

select count(1) from AT_A_SM_STOCKINGMAIN where 1=1 <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if location_s??> and LOCATION_S=:location_s </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if state_s??> and STATE_S=:state_s </#if> <#if stockno_s??> and STOCKNO_S=:stockno_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if vehiclecount_d??> and VEHICLECOUNT_D=:vehiclecount_d </#if>
